bpf.label: Filter Expression
bpf.description: tcpdump compatible filter expression for limiting the traffic examined (with BPF). See https://www.tcpdump.org/manpages/tcpdump.1.html

iface.label: Network Interface
iface.description: The network interface to capture traffic from

host_spec.label: Host Specification
host_spec.description: Subnets (comma separated) which should be considered belonging to this host, in CIDR form. Used for ingress/egress determination, defaults to host attached to the network interface.

pcap_source.label: Packet Capture Engine
pcap_source.description: Packet capture engine to use. Defaults to best for platform.
